c74object.name: j.map
c74object.description: j.map allows to scale and map values using various functions provided by the Jamoma function library. It handles continuous as well as discrete mappings. It also allows to set nodes address as input or output so you can remotely map Jamoma parameter or return values to parameter or messages

inlet.description: Int, float or list values sent at j.map leftmost inlet will get scaled and mapped according to the defined function and options

outlet.description: j.map leftmost outlet outputs the scaled and mapped version of the incoming value

method.name: dump
method.description: The dumpout message outputs values of the various attributes

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset j.map to initial attributes value
method.description: The reset message sets j.map attributes back to their value defined on initialization

attribute.name: active
attribute.description: The enable attribute toggles j.map mapping on or off (default = 1)

attribute.name: clipmode
attribute.digest: Set how values exceeding range will be clipped
attribute.description:
The clipmode attribute defines how values exceeding range will be clipped. Available clipmodes are:
none: when set to none (default), exceeding values will be left untouched
low: when set to low, values exceeding the lower bound will be clipped. Values exceeding the upper bound will be left untouched
high: when set to high, values exceeding the upper bound will be clipped. Values exceeding the lower bound will be left untouched
both: when set to both, values exceeding lower or upper bounds will be clipped

attribute.name: function
attribute.description: The function attribute sets the function used for mapping incoming values

attribute.name: function/library
attribute.description: The function/library attribute displays a list of all available

attribute.name: function/parameters
attribute.digest: Get parameters for the current function
attribute.description: The function/parameters attribute displays a list of all parameters for the function defined by the function attribute

attribute.name: function/samples
attribute.digest: Get a list of mapped sample values
attribute.description: The function/samples attribute displays a list of some mapped sample values. This can be useful to get visual feedback of the defined curve in a gui object ie. multislider, plot~)

attribute.name: input
attribute.digest: Address of a j.parameter or j.return to listen to
attribute.description: The input attribute sets an address of a j.parameter or j.return to be used for mapping to another j.parameter or j.message

attribute.name: input/index
attribute.digest: Pick an item from list input
attribute.description: When using as input a parameter or return address with type attribute set to array the input/index attribute selects an item to be mapped in the array. When set to 0 (default) all items from the array will get mapped

attribute.name: input/max
attribute.description: The input/max attribute sets the maximum input value

attribute.name: input/min
attribute.description: The input/min attribute sets the minimum input value

attribute.name: inverse
attribute.description: The inverse attribute switches minimum and maximum values

attribute.name: output
attribute.digest: Address of a j.parameter or j.message to send the value to
attribute.description: The output attribute sets an address of a j.parameter or j.message to be used as the destination of the mapping

attribute.name: output/max
attribute.description: The output/max attribute sets the maximum output value

attribute.name: output/min
attribute.description: The output/min attribute sets the minimum output value

attribute.name: ramp
attribute.description: The ramp attribute sets a smoothing function value (in milliseconds)
